title: Logo Critic
content:
![Logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018224357im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/4100/23283.gif)   
   
I am working on a logo for my personal blog and I am looking for some feedback. You can view my blog at [Jinxy.net](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018224357/http:/jinxy.net/). Let me know what you think.   
   
Sorry about the post above, I could not figure out how to delete it. This is my first post.
author: jaredly

comments.content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018224357im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/4100/23317.gif)   
   
What do you think? I think I like the nose.
What happens if you lose the nose?
Maybe he just needs a new nose. Looks cool overall.
